languages.text: "Ксенос права. Чем бы ни были эти устройства, лучше им оставаться на месте".

traits.locale_text: "Ксенос права. Чем бы ни были эти устройства, лучше им оставаться на месте".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос права. Чем бы ни были эти устройства, лучше им оставаться на месте".

traits.locale_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

languages.text: 「異種族の言うとおりだ。これらの装置が何であれ、現状のままにしておくのがいい」
languages.original_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の言うとおりだ。これらの装置が何であれ、現状のままにしておくのがいい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “那个异形说得对。不管这些装置究竟是什么，最好不要去动它们。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: “那个异形说得对。不管这些装置究竟是什么，最好不要去动它们。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « La xénos a raison. Quoi que puissent être ces dispositifs, mieux vaut les laisser en place. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: « La xénos a raison. Quoi que puissent être ces dispositifs, mieux vaut les laisser en place. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El xenos tiene razón. Sea lo que sean esos artilugios, lo mejor es dejarlos donde están».
languages.original_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: «El xenos tiene razón. Sea lo que sean esos artilugios, lo mejor es dejarlos donde están».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Xenos hat recht. Was auch immer das für Geräte sind, sie sollten bleiben, wo sie sind."
languages.original_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: "Der Xenos hat recht. Was auch immer das für Geräte sind, sie sollten bleiben, wo sie sind."

languages.text: "Zeno haklı. Bu cihazlar her neyse yerlerinde kalmaları daha iyi."
languages.original_text: "The xenos is right. Whatever these devices are, they are best left in place."

traits.locale_text: "Zeno haklı. Bu cihazlar her ne iseler yerlerinde kalmaları daha iyi."
